| History                 = Equal Rights For Every Intelligence, better known as E.R.F.E.I., was a charity that held a benefit basketball game in [[Austin]], [[Texas]]. Players present included [[Jeremy Lin (Earth-616)|Jeremy Lin]], [[Mirka (Earth-616)|Mirka]], [[Gah-Ran (Earth-616)|Gah-Ra]], and [[Arch-E-5912 (Earth-616)|Arch-E-5912]], who were accompanied by [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Amadeus Cho]], the new [[Hulk]], invited to the game by Lin.{{r|Totally Awesome Hulk Vol 1 13}}
